LongDescription: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese, a classic and timeless salad choice.

ShortDescription: Grilled beef patty in a bun
LongDescription: Juicy beef patty grilled to perfection, served in a soft bun with lettuce, tomato, onions, and condiments.

ShortDescription: Crispy rolls with vegetables and meat
LongDescription: Thin and crispy rolls filled with a mixture of vegetables, shrimp, and meat, served with sweet chili dipping sauce.
A traditional Japanese soup made with soybean paste, tofu, seaweed, and green onions, served hot and comforting.
